OOC: Like Shomin says, i have control of his characters.

:::Obsidian/Bludgeon/Hellbat:::

::Obsidian transforms to robot mode and he and Bludgeon walk onboard::
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------
::Hellbat wakes up.  he had been in stasis lock for a long time, since the 
battle against the Keepers.  he senses that something is wrong.  he flies to 
where the Deathcon used to be.  He sees that the base was in ruins.  he walks 
into what was left of the once proud war vessel::
Hellbat: Damn, what the hell happened?
::He sees Autojetter and Leozak's bodies::
Hellbat: So much for my old comrades.  Deathsaurus must be dead too.  I guess 
theres nothing for me to do except blow around from town to town, searching 
for a place to stand...
::He transforms into jet mode and flies around the world, looking for a 
faction to join.  he soon sees the Alliance base.  He flies down and 
transforms into robot mode.  He finds Zardus::
Hellbat: My name is Hellbat, my old faction has disapeered... May i join you?

--part1_aa.cfe2848.27434195_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
